name: The King is Dead!
description:
Noggin Means Brains is back.  This time the question is communication.   The message is simple.  Getting the distracted and busy citizens of the kingdom to repeat is...challenging.  Can you find a way to get your message heard in time?

Not familiar with Noggin means Brains and agile training games?  Visit our website to learn more:

Noggin Means Brains

This game is in beta test and is winnable but not finished.
